				BOSSE v. STATE2021 OK CR 23Case Number: PCD-2019-124Decided: 08/31/2021SHAUN MICHAEL BOSSE, Petitioner v. THE STATE OF OKLAHOMA, Respondent.
Cite as: 2021 OK CR 23, __  __

				

 




ORDER VACATING PREVIOUS ORDER AND JUDGMENT
GRANTING POST-CONVICTION RELIEF
AND WITHDRAWING OPINION FROM PUBLICATION


¶1 Based on the Court's decision in State ex rel. Matloff v. Wallace, 2021 OK CR 21, ___ P.3d ___, the previous order and judgment granting post-conviction relief in this case are hereby VACATED and SET ASIDE. The issuance of the mandate in this case was previously stayed by this Court on April 15, 2021, and no mandate has issued. The opinion in Bosse v. State, 2021 OK CR 3, 484 P.3d 286 is ...
